text: Baluna, â€˜he lokasakala! Abasya'i tomadera rabera kacha theke tomadera kache satya eseche. Kaje'i yara satpatha abalambana karabe tara to nijedera'i mangalera jan'ya satpatha abalambana karabe ebam yara pathabhrasta habe tara to pathabhrasta habe nijedera'i dhbansera jan'ya ebam ami tomadera upara karmabidhayaka na'i [1].â€˜
